Tesla Announces Release Date for Second Quarter Financial Results | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back Tesla Announces Release Date for Second Quarter Financial Results Globe Newswire Jul 17, 2014 &nbsp; PALO ALTO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 07/17/14 -- Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) announces that it will post its financial results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2014, after market close on Thursday, July 31, 2014. At that time, Tesla will issue a brief advisory release containing a link to the Q2 2014 Shareholder Letter, available on the company website. Tesla management will hold a live question &amp; answer webcast at 2:30pm Pacific Daylight Time (5:30pm Eastern Daylight Time) to discuss the Company's financial and business results and outlook. What: Tesla Motors, Inc. Q2 2014 Financial Results Q&amp;A Webcast When: Thursday, July 31, 2014 Time: 2:30pm Pacific Daylight Time / 5:30pm Eastern Daylight Time Shareholder Letter: http://ir.tesla.com Webcast: http://ir.tesla.com (live and replay) Approximately two hours after the Q&amp;A session, an archived version of the webcast will be available on the Company's website for a period of one year. For additional information, please visit http://ir.tesla.com .
